list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Add comprehensive WhatsApp communication analysis report
Introduced detailed analysis of WhatsApp chat patterns including emoji usage, sentiment analysis, and topic clustering. Added associated visualizations and a new logfile for tracking preprocessing. This provides valuable insights into digital communication dynamics, particularly in the context of neurodiversity and mental health.

task.summary:
Update .idea/workspace.xml and clean up src/timestamp.py
Remove unnecessary changes from .idea/workspace.xml and comment from visualize_hourly_activity in src/timestamp.py. This improves clarity and maintainability.

Update workspace and clean settings
Revised changes in .idea/workspace.xml, improved docstring format in visualizations.iml, and cleaned up imports in src/main.py for better code clarity and maintenance.

Refactor and enhance timestamp visualization
Updated `visualize_hourly_activity` to include modern styling, a smooth non-negative trend line, and improved data visualization and annotation. Cleaned up unused imports and improved the chart configuration for better readability and maintainability. Changed styling class and method signatures for better clarity.

Delete unused images, add new report documents, and enhance emoji analysis
Removed obsolete images related to clustering. Added comprehensive EMOJI.md and TEMPORAL.md reports. Enhanced emoji analysis in emoji_use.py with modern styling, additional pattern analysis, and detailed annotations. Also added dependency 'spacy' in pyproject.toml and improved text processing and clustering functionality in dimensionality.py.

Add sentiment-time analysis and visualization features
Introduced a new module `relationships.py` for sentiment analysis over time. Created detailed sentiment reports with visual findings. Updated dependencies and included Streamlit for interactive visualizations. Enhanced `dimensionality.py` for better keyword extraction and added functionality to convert Markdown reports to images.

Delete obsolete scripts and update documentation
Removed `create_png.py` and `dimvis.py` due to redundancy and lack of use. Added a GitHub URL to `REPORT.md` for easier access to the repository. This clean-up helps in maintaining code clarity and reduces repository clutter.

Add reports and analysis images
Introduce new reports and various analytical images to illustrate WhatsApp communication patterns, highlighting temporal dynamics, emoji usage, sentiment analysis, and topic clustering. This addition aims to enhance the understanding of digital interaction, particularly in the context of neurodiversity and mental health.

**Filter data, update sentiment analysis, and update clustering**
Enhance data filtering and update sentiment analysis to focus on meaningful signals. Introduce cluster themes for improved topic analysis and visualization, providing insights into message context and emotional patterns.

Add new dashboard and remove old Streamlit app
This commit introduces a new, advanced dashboard for WhatsApp analysis while removing the old Streamlit application. The new dashboard includes enhanced visualization settings, improved data processing, and added statistics for a more comprehensive user experience. Additionally, updated visualization configurations for higher resolution plots and improved clustering analysis have been added.

Add comprehensive WhatsApp communication analysis report
Introduced detailed analysis of WhatsApp chat patterns including emoji usage, sentiment analysis, and topic clustering. Added associated visualizations and a new logfile for tracking preprocessing. This provides valuable insights into digital communication dynamics, particularly in the context of neurodiversity and mental health.
